content.text: Hello! I'm doing pretty well, all things considered. Thanks for asking. How are you?
I'm doing okay, thank you for asking. I'm just a bit sad today because I lost my dog a few days ago.
Oh no! I'm so sorry to hear that. I know how it feels to lose a beloved pet. It's really tough.
Thanks. It is. He was my best friend.
I'm sure he was a great dog.
He was the best. I'm going to spend time with my family and try to remember all the good times we've had.
That sounds like a great way to spend your time. I'm sure your family will be there for you.
Thank you. I know they will.
Hey, if you ever need someone to talk to, I'm always here for you.
